description: JavaScript source code defining a jQuery plugin for a crossword puzzle, including initialization, coordinate calculation, table and entry building, answer checking, and navigation handling.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the crossword puzzle, sorts data, sets event handlers, and builds the puzzle table and entries.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for puzzle entries based on starting x,y and orientation, and adds clues to DOM.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Builds the HTML table structure for the crossword grid based on calculated rows and columns.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Creates input elements within grid cells for each puzzle entry, assigns classes, and adds entry numbers.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input group matches the correct answer and marks it as solved if correct.
